channel.title: Oakley Frag OX5045 – Men’s Designer Glasses
channel.description: Oakley started out as one man with $300 working from his garage. It has now turned into a multi-billion dollar corporation. Now owned by Italian firm, Luxottica, in a huge buyout deal, Oakley are now a worldwide designer eyewear manufacturer. Boasting the likes of Vogue in their portfolio, Luxottica have really boosted the brand to [...]
